QxtSlotJob Class Reference
[QxtCore module]

Execute an arbitrary Slot on a QThread. More... 

 #include <QxtSlotJob>

Inherits QxtJob.

Detailed Description

Warning: It is essential to understand that the QObject you pass is not safe to use untill done(); is emitted or result() or join() is called.

Member Documentation

QxtFuture detach ( QThread * o thread , QObject * recv , const char * slot , QGenericArgument p1 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p2 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p3 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p4 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p5 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p6 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p7 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p8 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p9 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p10 = QGenericArgument() ) static

execute slot from precv on thread detached
returns a QFuture which offers the functions required to get the result.

QxtFuture f= QxtSlotJob::detach(&thread,&q,SLOT(exec(QString)),Q_ARG(QString, "select NOW();"));

Warning: keep your hands of recv until you called QFuture::result();




QxtSlotJob ( QObject * recv , const char * slot , QGenericArgument p1 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p2 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p3 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p4 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p5 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p6 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p7 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p8 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p9 = QGenericArgument() , QGenericArgument p10 = QGenericArgument() )

Construct a new Job Object that will run slot from precv with the specified arguments




QVariant result ( )

asks for the result of the execution.
This calls QxtJob::join() means it will _block_ the current thread untill the Slot has finished execution




QxtFuture exec ( QThread * o thread )

execute this job on thread

Warning: keep your hands of the Object you passed until you called result() or join()




virtual void run ( )

This function is called by QxtJob.
reimplemented this function to do useful work.
Returning from this method will end the execution of the job.




void done ( QVariant )
